# target

**Instance Property**

An object that is notified when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var target: AnyObject? { get set }
```

## Handling slider interaction

- **action**: The selector on the target object that is invoked when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.
